Safeguarding inherited assets in the face of insolvency
Administration of an Insolvent Deceased Estate
Late claims against the Deceased Estate Usufructs
requirements: No prerequistes required
courses.description:
When administering the winding up of a deceased estate, it is important to know that each estate is unique, and that the information may not always fit your particular circumstances.
This session has been designed to discuss unique circumstances and specific transactions that needs to be dealt with in the winding up of the estate.


Topics Discussed:
Acquiring an asset from a Deceased Estate
Acquiring a property from a Deceased Estate
“Unnatural Causes” on a death certificate: Implications for Reporting the Estate
Financial uncertainty after your spouse’s passing
Safeguarding inherited assets in the face of insolvency
Administration of an Insolvent Deceased Estate
Executor Fraud
Challenging, Contesting and Disputing a will
Late claims against the Deceased Estate
Usufructs
Director/Shareholder dies with a credit loan
Director/Shareholder dies with a debit loan


All Included:
Video presented course
Downloadable course material
Certificate of training
Assessment (optional)
SAIT Accredited - 4 verifiable CPD points


About the Presenter:
Lize Muller
Lize is seasoned in the Administration of Deceased’s Estates as she has been administering deceased estates since 2001. Lize has an AIPSA Diploma in Insolvency Law and obtained a certificate in Administration of Deceased’s Estates, Continuing Legal Education and the Law Society of South Africa.
Lize has now decided to share her vast knowledge on the subject to learners wanting to embark on this journey.
target_audience: Employees, Managers, Financial Staff and Individuals

requirements: Apta para todo tipo de estudiantes, se incluye curso previo de Excel para aquellos con menor manejo del programa
courses.description:
Aprender a realizar valoraciones en bienes inmuebles (Real Estate)
En este curso aprenderás a valorar en detalle operaciones de inversión en vivienda en sus distintas variantes (reforma, venta, explotación en alquiler, airbnb, ...). Durante el mismo, daremos un repaso integral a todos los puntos a tener en cuenta antes de acometer una inversión inmobiliaria (legal, técnico, financiero, económico, ...).


Si tienes pensado invertir en vivienda, este es tu curso. Al final del mismo, podrás descargarte el modelo financiero que sirve de apoyo durante todo el curso, de manera que podrás realizar estudios de inversión de manera automática teniendo al instante los principales parámetros y métricas económico-financieras que has de tener en cuenta.


A diferencia de otros cursos de la plataforma, este modulo tiene un enfoque eminentemente financiero y cuyo principal objetivo es saber valorar los principales KPI de la inversión (Dinero a desembolsar, Inversión a realizar, Rentabilidad estimada, Beneficio estimado, Dinero que tengo que tener disponible, etc.)


El modelo financiero es fácilmente adaptable en función de las hipótesis que rijan en la localidad de la inversión. El curso está basado en hipótesis que aplican actualmente en el mercado español, pero es fácilmente adaptable al resto de mercados tan solo modificando las variables que apliquen en cada caso.


El objetivo es obtener un análisis eminentemente financiero en el que se tengan en cuenta las distintas variables para poder tomar la decisión de invertir o rechazar una oportunidad en un bien inmueble, así cómo repasar los highlights de otros aspectos que influyen directamente en nuestra inversión desde el punto de vista técnico, de financiación y legal.


Adicionalmente, se incluye un primer bloque de funciones de Excel, muy interesante para familiarizarse con el uso de esta herramienta, algunas de ellas de nivel muy avanzado.
target_audience: Inversores
Particulares que quieran comprar una vivienda (inversión)
Personas que se dediquen al mundo inmobiliario

requirements: Não é necessário ter experiência
courses.description:
O curso de Cuba Esculpida em Porcelanato, ministrado pelo experiente instrutor Fabiano Ferreira, é uma oportunidade única para profissionais e entusiastas da construção civil aprimorarem suas habilidades e aprenderem uma técnica sofisticada e moderna. Com 25 anos de experiência no setor, Fabiano Ferreira traz um vasto conhecimento prático e teórico para suas aulas, garantindo um aprendizado completo e detalhado.


Neste curso, os alunos irão explorar desde os fundamentos do porcelanato até as técnicas avançadas de escultura e acabamento. Serão abordados temas como escolha e preparação do material, utilização de ferramentas específicas, técnicas de corte e polimento, além de dicas essenciais para garantir um resultado profissional e duradouro.


As aulas são estruturadas para proporcionar um equilíbrio entre teoria e prática, permitindo que os participantes coloquem a mão na massa e desenvolvam suas habilidades sob a orientação cuidadosa de Fabiano. Cada etapa do processo será explicada com clareza, desde a concepção do design até a instalação final da cuba esculpida.


Ao final do curso, os alunos estarão capacitados para criar peças únicas e sofisticadas, valorizando qualquer ambiente com a elegância do porcelanato. Não perca a chance de aprender com um mestre da construção civil e elevar seu trabalho a um novo patamar.
target_audience: Esse curso foi criado para quem deseja fabricar cuba esculpida em porcelanato

requirements: keine
courses.description:
Dieses Training ist der perfekte Start für jeden Immobilieninteressierten. Egal ob du dich noch nie mit Immobilien beschäftigt hast oder bereits Experte bist, wird dir dieses Training hilfreiche Tipps und Tricks für deinen Immobilienkauf geben.


Deine Referenten Stefan und Eric geben dir einen umfangreichen Überblick über die einzelnen Schritte des Immobilienkaufs und gehen auf jede einzelne Phase detailliert ein. Unser Training beschäftigt sich unter anderem mit folgenden Themen:
Die Prozessschritte beim Immobilienkauf
Vor- und Nachteile von unterschiedlichen Anlageformen
Entscheidungshilfe: Wohnung, Haus oder Garage
Budgetcheck
Regionencheck
Unterschiedliche Suchmethoden für die perfekte Immobilie
Objektanalyse von Zuhause aus
Besichtigungstermin und erste Immobilienanalyse
Immobilienbewertung
Kommunikation mit Makler und Verkäufer
Finanzierung und Kommunikation mit der Bank
Vorbereitung des Notartermins und wie es danach weiter geht
etc.


In über 9 Stunden Video-Lektionen leiten wir euch Schritt für Schritt durch den Prozess bis hin zum erfolgreichen Immobilenkauf. Das Training ist in mehr als 35 Lektionen aufgeteilt. So könnt ihr auch nur Videos zu einzelnen Themen anschauen, die euch gerade in eurer Situation interessieren, oder auch zu Lektionen zurück springen, die ihr vielleicht nochmals anschauen möchtet.
Neben den umfangreichen Video-Lektionen bietet euch unser Training Dokumente und Unterlagen, die euch bei eurem Immobilienkauf helfen werden. Alle Videos und zusätzlichen Unterlagen stehen dir nach Erwerb des Trainings lebenslang auf Udemy zur Verfügung.


Viel Spaß beim Lernen und beim erfolgreichen Immobilenkauf.
target_audience: Immobilieninterssierte
Passives Einkommen durch Immobilien
Immobilieninvestoren
Immobilienmakler

Bonus Lecture - How to get your own web scrapper advanced course enrollment

requirements: Familiarity with basic data analysis functions in Excel or Google Sheets.
courses.description:
Who is this course for and how will it profit me?
If any of these scenarios apply to you, then I’ve been in your shoes. So let me show you how to quit guessing and dominate any marketplace by coaching you in detail through the next-level strategies that the real estate “gurus” keep for themselves.
Are you a listing agent tired of the constant hustle to find quality leads and the complete lack of advanced training from your broker?
Are you a wholesaler looking to crack the two-sided market problem of securing properties at a discount while lining up cash buyers beforehand?
Are you a cash investor fed up with the limited inventory and heavy competition that keeps squeezing your margins?
Are you an auction buyer who’s sick of bidding blind and winning only the lowest profit homes?
Are you a note investor who’s beginning to feel like this is too risky and there has to be a safer way to invest in liens?
This isn’t a general overview of real estate flipping or renting. You can find that basic level stuff online. There’s no fluff in here and I won’t waste your time nor mine going over the boring background of “why you should invest in off-market real estate.”
Instead, this is a bootcamp to get you up and running at a pro-level as fast as possible. This is a complete technical solution, sales training, deal mentoring and long-term skill building program designed to solve the five biggest problems residential real estate investors and listing agents face:
Generating white hot and vetted leads before anyone else without a marketing budget.
There are a million real estate lead generator services out there, but the vast majority simply scrape the low-hanging fruit—public notices that everyone already has access to, then resell that information multiple times. And don’t get me started on the expensive and wasteful direct mailing campaigns. So instead of spamming out 10,000 letters and hope 1% of homeowners respond, how about filtering through 10,000 pre-foreclosures in a matter of minutes and only send letters to the top 1% with the most equity available? Skip the chaff and focus all your effort on the highest equity deals in the best neighborhoods with the most motivated sellers.
My method will show you how to find and contact judicial pre-foreclosures before the owner even knows they’re facing foreclosure. This gives you a 4-6 week head start on any other cash investor and makes sure you’re the first to reach out to the homeowner.
For non-judicial states where Notices of Default are publicly available for everyone at the same time, I’ll show you how to reproduce the expensive 3rd party title search services you’re used to hiring. Then you can pull even more information, in unlimited volume, and do so faster. Best of all, you’ll now see the cherry-picked ultra-high equity properties that 3rd party firms like to leave out from the records for their own profit.
Predicting costs, equity and a realistic market value with reliable and repeatable precision.
Obviously, the hands-down most important consideration with any investment is how much equity is in the deal. Followed closely by how fast you can wholesale, flip or rent the property out. Simple enough, but the devil frolics in the details. With our automated approach, you'll be able to find all the hidden debt attached to a property and estimate yours and the end user’s costs with extreme accuracy. Then determine a realistic selling price, regardless of the true market value. This allows you to screen every pre-foreclosure in your marketplace in moments while only investing serious time in the most profitable deals.
Unless your niche is rehabbing damaged properties, you don’t need to know a thing about estimating repairs and ARV. Just knowing how to spot “good” neighborhoods, how to get up to sellable standards in a hurry and price realistically will make sure you only spend time on deals with a minimum of 30% equity involved. Best of all, you’ll know exactly how much the home will sell for, your estimated costs and hence equity, plus how much you can offer before you even reach out to the homeowner or see the place in person.
Sealing the deal fast and at a discount.
Yes, I’ll teach you several next-level sales scripts for when you’re ready to make contact, but excellent salesmanship is table stakes in this game. What will give you an edge is being able to offer creative yet legitimate win-win deals and become a true angel investor. Maybe you’ve seen it already when you offer a distressed seller a reasonable cash offer, in “as is” condition and with fast closing… yet they just aren’t interested. Even if you come up in price a bit, they won’t budge. What’s wrong? What are you missing?
What a shame to be the first investor to reach them and then give up because they didn’t respond to your standard sales script. I’ll show you the simple ways to listen to homeowners’ concerns, and not just hear what they’re saying, while leveraging the property research data you’ve gathered to build instant rapport and trust. With a careful and well thought out initial approach, you can always find a way for both of you to profit. Even if a regular title transfer isn’t immediately in the cards.
Exiting any position fast and at a guaranteed profit, no matter what X-factors hit.
Maybe you’re already familiar with all the legal maneuvering to structure your deals with plenty of “bail out” exit clauses, but wouldn’t it be even better to make sure you still profit instead of just running for the hills? I’ll show you all the “second chance” lease options and foreclosure surplus positioning moves that the pros like to keep close to their chests as trade secrets.
And whether you plan on taking control of every property yourself or not, wouldn’t it be useful to have a vast network of local cash buyers on hand if you need to wholesale? We all stretch our capital to the limits at times, plus these data mining techniques will generate far more great deals than you can personally buy. So why not tweak your algorithms to find the active investors in your local marketplace so you can reach out to buyers of similar property types and offer a win-win deal when time is of the essence?
target_audience: Real estate listing agents, wholesalers and cash investors.

courses.title: Tenant Screening for Landlords
courses.bio: A course for landlords to learn how to screen tenants
requirements: Must own or manage rental properties and active screen potential renters
courses.description:
In this course, my goal is for you as a potential landlord or existing landlord to be able to effectively understand how to screen a potential tenant, what to ask on your applications, how to set your rental requirements, and ultimately how to either accept or reject a tenant based upon the application collected as well as the screening results of the application.
My name is Ray O'Daniel and I have over 17 years of experience managing rental properties I have made about every mistake a landlord can make in the rental property business. As a result of this, I'm in a key position to be able to help new people who are buying a rental property, not make the same mistakes I've made in the past. Bad tenants have cost me ten of thousands of dollars in lost rent and repairs to my properties.
That is the reason I've taken the time to create this course to hopefully give people an education on how to effectively construct a good application screening because choosing the right tenant for your property can mean the difference between success and failure to a landlord.
Please take the time to review all the modules of this course. And I hope it will serve you well.
target_audience: Landlords that want to screen their own rental applications and make the best choices towards find a renter.

courses.title: Inspections, Fire Safety and Maintenance For Landlords
courses.bio: Protect, Maintain, and Profit From Your Investment

Fire Safety, A Real Lifesaver: Fire Safety & Tenant Education - Landlord Responsibilities
Efficiencies & Sustainability For Financ: Strategic Upgrades To Enhance Efficiency and Develop Sustainability

requirements: No landlord experience required.
courses.description:
This session highlights the importance of conducting annual inspections, maintaining fire safety standards, and performing timely maintenance to ensure successful property management.
Regular inspections allow landlords to identify and address minor issues before they escalate, reducing repair costs and preserving property value. Implementing fire safety measures protects tenants, minimizes liability, lowers insurance premiums, and prevents potential legal disputes.
Well-maintained properties enhance tenant satisfaction, leading to timely rent payments and long-term tenancies. Additionally, incorporating energy-efficient upgrades reduces utility expenses and increases property value, making sustainability a smart investment for landlords.
In this session, we will cover:
Key areas to inspect for property defects.
Benefits of annual inspections and prompt maintenance.
Financial and legal risks of neglecting due diligence.
Essential fire safety checks and educating tenants on fire prevention.
Responding to tenant fire safety concerns effectively.
Differentiating between required maintenance, desired improvements, and accommodations.
20 essential maintenance tasks landlords should complete annually.
Exploring energy-efficient and sustainable upgrades to reduce costs and increase property value.
This comprehensive module provides landlords with practical strategies for maintaining their properties efficiently, safeguarding tenant well-being, and enhancing long-term profitability.
Join us as we explore these critical aspects of property management, providing practical insights and real-life examples to help you navigate your responsibilities with confidence. By the end of this module, you'll have the knowledge and tools to maintain safe, compliant, and well-maintained rental properties while protecting your investment and fostering positive tenant relationships. Let’s get started!
target_audience: This course is for those considering the landlord profession, new to being a landlord, or a landlord wishing to enhance their skills.

courses.title: Die besten Portale zur Ferienvermietung finden
courses.bio: Anleitung zur Auswahl der effektivsten Unterkunftsportale für eine optimale Vermarktung von Ferienhaus & Ferienwohnung
objectives: Sie können die Vermietung Ihres Ferienobjektes über Unterkunftsportale strukturiert und erfolgsorientiert planen
Sie filtern die erfolgversprechenden Unterkunftsportale für Ihr Ferienobjekt und die gewählten Gästezielgruppen selbständig heraus.
Sie binden regionale, Nischen- und Spezialportale optimal in Ihre Vermarktungsstrategie ein.
Sie werten Ihre Rechercheergebnisse eigenständig aus, um Ihre Belegungsquote zu optimieren
Sie kalkulieren entsprechend Ihrem Budget Inseratskosten und Verwaltungsaufwand für Ihre Portalpräsentation

Grundlagen der Vermietung von Ferienobje: Platz da! Die Markteroberung durch Unterkunftsportale
Bringen wir Ordnung in den Portalmarkt.
Durchblick im Dschungel der verschiedenen Preismodelle
Voraussetzungen für eine effektive Porta: Wollen Sie doppeltes oder einfaches Marketing betreiben?
Wie finde ich die richtigen Unterkunftsp: Wie wird nach meiner Ferienregion recherchiert?
Ein geniales Recherchewerkzeug: Der Google Keyword Planner.
Schritt 1: Das Herausfiltern gut frequentierter Suchbegriffe
Schritt 3: So findet man zielgruppengerechte Unterkunftsportale

requirements: Erfahrungen als Vermieter eines Ferienhauses oder einer Ferienwohnung sind von Nutzen, um unseren Marketingüberlegungen jederzeit folgen zu können

Unsere Schritt-für-Schritt-Anleitung ist leicht verständlich und erfordert kein spezielles technisches oder Marketing-Know how. Grundlegende Kenntnisse im Umgang mit dem Internet sollten vorhanden sein.
Darüberhinaus genügen Enthusiasmus und Spaß an der Ferienvermietung. Das Basismotto lautet: Learning by doing!
courses.description:
Für Eigentümer einer Ferienimmobilie ist die clevere Vermarktung des Objektes an Feriengäste eine Aufgabe mit zahlreichen Facetten und Möglichkeiten. Neben der eigenen Fewo-Homepage, dem Marketing über Social Media-Kanäle und Offlinemedien sowie einem kreativen Stammgästemarketing ist die richtige Nutzung von Unterkunftsportalen ein wichtiges Vermietungsinstrument, das es geschickt einzusetzen gilt.
In diesem Kurs erfahren Sie, welche Grundlagen zu einem überdurchschnittlichen Vermietungserfolg auf Unterkunftsportalen führen und wie man als Vermieter das/die richtige(n) Portal(e) auswählt.
Im ersten Abschnitt vermitteln wir Basiswissen zum Portalmarkt, erläutern das Erfolgsgeheimnis der Unterkunftsportale und bringen Ordnung in den vielschichtigen Markt der Unterkunftsplattformen. Zudem verschaffen wir uns einen Überblick im Dschungel der zahlreichen Preismodelle.
Im zweiten Abschnitt kümmern wir uns um die Voraussetzungen für eine effektive Portalwahl. Dabei gehen wir auf die Bestimmung passender Gästezielgruppen ein, eruieren den zu erwartenden Marketingaufwand und stellen wesentliche Überlegungen zur Saisonalität und der ganzjährigen Vermietbarkeit an.
Im dritten Abschnitt gehen wir detailliert auf die richtige Vorgehensweise bei der Auswahl erfolgversprechender Unterkunftsportale ein. Wir recherchieren, auf welchen Wegen potentielle Buchungsinteressenten zu den Portalen gelangen und untersuchen die Bedeutung von Positionen in den Suchmaschinen. Mit Hilfe eines cleveren Tools ermitteln wir an einem konkreten Beispiel, welche Unterkunftsplattformen für das Beispielobjekt attraktiv sind.
Darüberhinaus beleuchten wir die Inseratskosten auf den favorisierten Portalen, werfen einen ausführlichen Blick auf zielgruppengerechte Nischen- und Spezialportale und geben Tipps für eine schlanke und zeitsparende Verwaltung genutzter Portalkanäle. Hilfreiches Downloadmaterial für eine begleitende Recherche passender Portale für das eigene Ferienobjekt ist verschiedenen Lektionen beigefügt.
target_audience: Der Kurs richtet sich an alle Vermieter eines Ferienobjektes für Urlaubsgäste, welche Unterkunftsportale als Vermarktungskanal nutzen, optimieren oder künftig einsetzen wollen
Auch zukünftige Eigentümer einer Ferienimmobilie erhalten wertvolle Hinweise für die Planung der späteren Vermietung des Domizils

courses.description:
KURS AÇIKLAMASI
PROGRAMIN AMAÇLARI:
Bu program ile kursiyerlerin;
1. Emlakçilik ile ilgili genel kavramları öğrenmeleri, mesleği tanımaları,
2. Emlakçiliğin hukuki ve ekonomik boyutları hakkında bilgi sahibi olmaları,
3. Emlak pazarlamasında dikkat etmesi gereken hususları kavramaları,
4. Halkla ilişkiler ve sosyoloji ile ilgili temel bilgilere sahip olmaları,
5. Halkla ilişkilerde kurumsal imajın önemini kavramaları,
6. Büro yönetimi ve iletişim tekniklerini emlak bürosunda kullanmaları,
7. Davranış bilimleri ve beden dili hakkında bilgi sahibi olarak iş hayatında bunları kullanmaları,
8. Tapu sicili ve tapu ile ilgili genel tanımları kavramaları,
9. Resmi yazı ile yapılan tapu işlemleri ve tüzel kişilerin gayrimenkul tasarrufları hakkında bilgi sahibi olmaları,
10. Tapuda akitli ve akitsiz işlemlerle ilgili, mesleğinin gerektirdiği detayları kavramaları,
11. Kadastronun kavramı, ekibi ve çalışma alanı hakkında bilgi sahibi olmaları,
12. Kadastro çalışmalarında izlenecek yolu kavramaları,
13. Kadastro Müdürlüklerine başvuru şeklini kavramaları,
14. Kadastrodaki işlemler için gerekli belgeleri tanımaları,
15. Kadastro işlemlerinde kullanılacak vekaletnamelerde aranan hususları tanımaları,
16. Uygulamada karşılaşabilecekleri sorunların, çözümü için Gayrimenkul Hukukunun genel hükümlerini kavramaları,
17. Türk Hukuk Sistemi içinde Emlak Aracılığı ve Emlak Komisyonculuğunun yeri konusunda bilgi edinmeleri,
18. Emlak danışmanlığının tanımı ve konusu hakkında bilgi edinmeleri,
19. Emlak danışmanlığında vergilendirme ve biçimsel vergi yükümlülüklerinin neler olduğu hakkında bilgi edinmeleri,
20. Emlak alım - satım, kiralama ve değerleme (ekspertiz) hizmetlerinin temel bilgilerini edinerek meslekte kendilerini sürekli geliştirmeyi alışkanlık haline getirmeleri,
21. Şehir planlaması ile ilgili tanımları ve planlama esaslarını kavramaları,
22. Kentleşme ve imar hukuku hakkında temel bilgileri edinmeleri

courses.title: SORUMLU EMLAK DANIŞMANI-A3 KURS-MESLEKİ YETERLİLİK BELGESİA3
courses.bio: 17UY0333-5/A3 EMLAK SATIŞ/KİRALAMA VE SONRASI İŞLEMLERİ YETERLİLİK BİRİMİ
objectives: 17UY0333-5 SORUMLU EMLAK DANIŞMANI ULUSAL YETERLİLİĞİ Seviye 5 MESLEKİ YETERLİLİK BELGESİ SINAVINA HAZIRLIK – A3

Sorumlu Emlak Danışmanı (Seviye 5) mesleğinin eğitim almış ve nitelik kazandırılmış kişiler tarafından yürütülmesi ve çalışmalarda kalitenin artırılması için; - Adayların sahip olması gereken nitelikleri, bilgi, beceri ve yetkinlikleri kavratmak, - Adayların, geçerli ve güvenilir bir belge ile mesleki yeterliliğini kanıtlamasına olanak vermek, - Eğitim sistemine, sınav ve belgelendirme kuruluşlarına referans ve kaynak oluşturmaktır.
A3 EMLAK SATIŞ/KİRALAMA VE SONRASI İŞLEMLERİ YETERLİLİK BİRİMİ KURSUMUZDA NELER ÖĞRENECEĞİZ:
A3 Yeterlilik birimi, MYK yetkili Belgelendirme Kuruluşları sınavına hazırlık konularını öğreneceğiz.
a) Tapu kütüğüne kayıtlı olsun ya da olmasın taşınmaz alım satımı ve kiralaması konusunda pazarlama faaliyetinde bulunmak ve aracılık yapmak.
b) Alım satım ve kiralamaya konu taşınmazla ilgili inceleme, araştırma ve raporlama yapmak.
c) Taşınmazın rayiç satış veya kira bedeli hakkında iş sahibine bilgi vermek.
ç) Tapu işlemlerine aracılık etmek.

d) Alıcı veya kiracı ile sözleşme yapmak, kira bedeli ödemeleri ile abonelik işlemlerini takip etmek, taşınmazın tamiri, bakımı ve onarımı gibi hizmetlerin verilmesini sağlamak ve bu hususlarla ilgili süreç hakkında iş sahibini bilgilendirmek.
e) Taşınmazla ilgili danışmanlık ve yönetim hizmeti vermek.
f) Taşınmaz ticaretine ilişkin diğer hizmetleri yürütmek.

Önemli NOT: Sorumlu Emlak Danışmanlığı ve Emlak danışmanlığı Kurslarımız A1-A2-A3 olmak üzere üç bölümden oluşmaktadır. Belgelendirme sınavına girmek için bu üç ayrı kursu da almak gerekmektedir. Tek kurs sadece bir "Yeterlilik birimini" içermektedir.
Bu A3 bölümü; Emlak Satış/ Kiralama ve Sonrası İşlemleri konularını içermektedir.

courses.description:
17UY0333-5/A3 EMLAK SATIŞ/KİRALAMA VE SONRASI İŞLEMLERİ YETERLİLİK BİRİMİ


1-YETERLİLİK BİRİMİ ADI:Emlak Satış/Kiralama ve Sonrası İşlemleri
2-REFERANS KODU:17UY0333-5/A3
3-SEVİYE:5
4-KREDİ DEĞERİ:-
5-A)YAYIN TARİHİ:29/11/2017
B)REVİZYON NO:00
C)REVİZYON TARİHİ:-
6-YETERLİLİK BİRİMİNE KAYNAK TEŞKİL EDEN MESLEK STANDARDI
13UMS0365-5 / Pazarlama Sorumlusu Seviye 5
16UMS0520-5 / Satış Sorumlusu Seviye 5
12UMS0267-5 / Satın Alma Sorumlusu Seviye 5
7-ÖĞRENME ÇIKTILARI
Öğrenme Çıktısı 1: İşletmenin mevcut emlak portföyünü kontrol eder.
Başarım Ölçütleri:
1.1 : Portföyün güncelliği ve güvenilirliğini kontrol eder.
1.2: Portföydeki emlakın durum tespiti ile ilgili bilgileri kontrol eder.
1.3: Portföydeki emlakın tespit edilen güncel rayiç bedelini onaylar.
1.4: Portföydeki emlakın sahibi ile imzalanacak belgeleri kontrol eder.
Öğrenme Çıktısı 2: Emlakın satış/kiralanmasına ilişkin hazırlıkları yapar.
2.1: Portföydeki emlakın tanıtım yöntemini onaylar.
2.2: Pazarlama için gerekli araç, gereç, malzeme ve hizmetleri temin eder.
2.3: Portföydeki emlakın satış/kiralamaya uygun hale getirilmesini sağlar.
2.4 : Emlakın satış/kiralama bedelinin belirlenmesi ve pazarlık sürecini takip eder.
2.5 : Emlak sahibi/müşteri arasında yapılacak satış sözleşmesini/kira kontratını kontrol eder.
Öğrenme Çıktısı 3: Emlak satış/kiralama sonrası işlemlerinin yürütülmesini sağlar.
Başarım Ölçütleri:
3.1 Tapu ve teslimat işlemlerinin yapılması sürecini takip eder.
3.2: Hizmet bedelinin tahsilatı işlemlerini gerçekleştirir.
3.3: Satış/kiralama sonrası portföy güncellenmesini kontrol eder.
3.4: Satış/kiralama sonrası hizmetleri yürütür.
Öğrenme Çıktısı 4: Emlaka ilişkin fizibilite ve yatırım danışmanlığı hizmeti verir.
Başarım Ölçütleri:
4.1 : Yatırım müşterisinin talep ve ihtiyaçlarını belirler.
4.2: Talep ve ihtiyaçlar doğrultusunda fizibilite çalışmaları yapar.
4.3: Yatırım müşterisine alternatif yatırım olanaklarını sunar.
8-ÖLÇME VE DEĞERLENDİRME
8 a) Teorik Sınav
Çoktan Seçmeli Sınav: A3 birimine yönelik teorik sınav Ek A3-2’de yer alan “Bilgiler” kontrol listesine göre gerçekleştirilir. Teorik sınavda adaylara en az yirmi (20) soruluk 4 seçenekli çoktan seçmeli ve her biri eşit puan değerinde yazılı sınav uygulanmalıdır. Çoktan seçmeli sorularla düzenlenmiş sınavda yanlış
cevaplandırılan sorulardan herhangi bir puan indirimi yapılmaz. Sınavda adaylara her soru için 1.5 dakika zaman verilir. Yazılı sınavda soruların en az % 70’ına doğru yanıt veren aday başarılı sayılır. Sınav soruları, bu birimde teorik sınav ile ölçülmesi öngörülen tüm bilgi ifadelerini (Ek A3-2) ölçmelidir.
8 b) Performansa Dayalı Sınav
(P1) Beceri ve Yetkinlik Uygulamaları: A3 birimine yönelik performansa dayalı sınav Ek A3-2’de yer alan “Beceriler ve Yetkinlikler” kontrol listesine göre gerçekleştirilir. Performans sınavında; beceri ve yetkinlik ifadelerinde yer alan ölçütlere uygun senaryo(lar), bilgi notları ve diğer açıklayıcı dokümanlar kullanılarak, adayların emlak satış/kiralama ve sonrası işlemleri uygulamalarında; planlama, organizasyon, takip, ikna ve iletişim becerileri, iş kapsamına uygun inisiyatif alma, veri-alan-süreç hakimiyeti gözlemlenecektir. Bu amaçla;
· Ek A3-2’de yer alan beceri ve yetkinlik uygulamalarını yapması istenecektir.
· Değerlendiriciler gerekli gördükleri noktalarda, belirlenecek kurallara göre sözel sorular sorup açıklamalar isteyebilirler. Performansa dayalı sınavın süresi gerçek uygulama şartlarındaki süreye karşılık gelmelidir.
Adayın, performans sınavından başarı sağlaması için kritik adımların tamamından başarılı performans göstermek koşuluyla sınavın genelinden asgari % 70 başarı göstermesi gerekir. Performansa dayalı sınavın süresi, uygulamanın kapsamına göre tespit edilerek sınav kontrol listesinde belirtilir. Performansa dayalı sınav gerçeğine uygun olarak düzenlenmiş çalışma ortamında ve çalışma ekipmanları ile gerçekleştirilir. Beceri ve yetkinlik ifadelerinin (Ek A3-2) tamamı performansa dayalı sınav ile ölçülmelidir.
8 c) Ölçme ve Değerlendirmeye İlişkin Diğer Koşullar
Birim için öngörülen sınavların geçerlilik süresi sınavın başarıldığı tarihten itibaren 1 yıldır. Adayın kendi ve diğer kişilerin can güvenliğini tehlikeye sokacak bir davranış göstermesi halinde sınava son verilir.


9-YETERLİLİK BİRİMİNİ GELİŞTİREN KURUM/KURULUŞ(LAR):Türkiye Tüm Emlak Müşavirleri Federasyonu (TEMFED)
10-YETERLİLİK BİRİMİNİ DOĞRULAYAN SEKTÖR KOMİTESİ :MYK Ticaret Sektör Komitesi
11-MYK YÖNETİM KURULU ONAY TARİHİ VE SAYISI
29/11/2017-2017/109


KURS VE EĞİTMENİN HİÇBİR SORUMLULUK VE YÜKÜMLÜLÜĞÜ YOKTUR.
Bu kurstaki bilgiler tamamen genel bilgilendirme ve eğitim amaçlıdır. Kurs kapsamındaki bilgilerin güncel ve doğru olmasına azami özen gösterilmiş olmasına rağmen kurs ve eğitmen; bu bilgilerin eksiksizliği, doğruluğu, güvenilirliği, uygunluğu ya da elverişliliğine ilişkin olarak ve yahut da herhangi bir amaç için kurs metninde bulunan bilgi, ürün, hizmet ya da ilgili grafikler konusunda alenen ya da zımni hiçbir yükümlülük üstlenmemektedir. Bu sebeple, bu bilgilere dayanılması kesinlikle bilgiye riayet edenin kendi sorumluluğundadır. Dokümanlar kullanılarak herhangi bir vekil-müvekkil ya da avukat-müvekkil ilişkisi meydana getirilemez. Kurs ve Kurs Eğitmeni; kâr kaybı ya da diğer bütün kayıpların sebep olduğu doğrudan ya da dolaylı hasarlar da dâhil olmak üzere herhangi bir kayıp ya da zarardan yükümlü ya da sorumlu tutulamaz.
"Burada yer alan yatırım bilgi, yorum ve tavsiyeleri yatırım danışmanlığı kapsamında değildir. Yatırım danışmanlığı hizmeti, yetkili kuruluşlar tarafından kişilerin risk ve getiri tercihleri dikkate alınarak kişiye özel sunulmaktadır. Burada yer alan yorum ve tavsiyeler ise genel niteliktedir. Bu tavsiyeler mali durumunuz ile risk ve getiri tercihlerinize uygun olmayabilir. Bu nedenle, sadece burada yer alan bilgilere dayanılarak yatırım kararı verilmesi beklentilerinize uygun sonuçlar doğurmayabilir. İşbu kurs ve eğitmen aracılığı ile sunulan tavsiyelere dayanarak alınan/alınacak yatırım kararlarının ve yapılan/yapılacak alım satım vb. işlemlerinden ve bu işlemlerin olası neticelerinden Kurs ve Kurs eğitmeni herhangi bir surette sorumlu değildir. ”

courses.description:
既存物件の契約、新築物件の完成、おめでとうございます！
これであなたも私の提唱する「誰の都合にも左右されない人生」...時間とお金からの自由に一歩近づきましたね。


ですが、ちょっと待ってくださいね！
きっとあなたは、入居募集に頭を悩ましていると思いますが、建物の保全を先にしておきましょう。


決済日（残代金の支払い・鍵の引き渡し・所有権移転登記をする日/新築物件は保存登記をする日）から、あなたの所有物になります。もし、決済の当日、万が一火事になったり、大地震で建物が損壊したり津波に流されたりしても、既にあなたの所有物ですから売主や建築会社は何も責任を負ってくれません。
ですので、早めに損害保険会社に見積もりを取り、比較検討して、契約しておかなくてはいけません。


とは言え、こんな悩みや相談が多いものです。


何日前までに契約しないといけないのか？
この保険料は高くないか？ 保険金額・必要な特約・不要な特約・免責の設定は合っているのか？
必要なときに保険金を払ってもらえるのか？ 保険金の不払い問題って聞いたことがあるんだけど？
地震保険に入るべきか？ 大地震が来たら、そのときはしょうがないんじゃないのか？
入居者が全員、火災保険に入っているから大家は入らなくてもいいのでは？
誰に相談したらいいのか？ 管理会社・仲介会社・知人の代理店・銀行・保険会社の本社？
代理店からの提案が何だか曖昧？ 適当？ で不安なんだけど？


あなたはどうですか？


決済日が直前だからといって、適当な保険で契約してしまうと...


過剰な補償内容で必要以上に高い保険料を何年も何年も払うことになる
建物に問題が生じたのに、保険の対象にならずに保険金が受け取れない
保険金の不払い問題に対処するのに時間や手間やストレスを抱える
なんてことにあるのは嫌ですよね。


でも、もし適切な補償内容で適切な保険料で契約できたら...


必要なときに必要な保険金がスムーズに受け取れる
災害による建物の損壊を軽微なうちに早めに修繕できる
となりますよね。


そうすると、例えば突然の雨漏りが起きたときに、入居者の家財は入居者の保険で補償されるとはいえ、大家さんの責任として次のような損失を回避できるようになります。


入居者に迷惑料（見舞金）を払う
家賃の減額請求をされる
修繕中に賃貸できないために家賃収入が減る
急いで修繕しないといけないので相見積もりできず割高な工事費を支払う


実は、不動産運用で良くある失敗は、空室や家賃下落などではなく、想定外の大きな支出なのです。


その支出は保険でカバーすべきなのに、十分な補償がなければ意味がありません。
また、過剰な補償で割高な保険料を支払い続けていると、キャッシュフローが貯まりません。


不動産収入を順調に残すためには、適切な火災保険・地震保険に入ることはもちろん、スムーズに支払ってもらうための請求の実務知識も必要となります。


本来、このあたりは保険代理店が担うはずなのです。しかし、ちょっとやそっとの台風などでは、保険代理店も保険会社本体も、お伺い...このあいだの台風で被害はありませんでしたか？　こちらで建物調査しましょうか？　などと、電話も手紙も来ることはありません。


ぜひ、今回のコースで、適切な保険契約をして、適切な保険料を払い、適切に保険金を受け取って、適切な修繕を行い、しっかりと不動産収入を積み上げ、資産価値を守っていきましょう。


そうして、あなたが本当に手に入れたい未来を、確実に近づけていきましょう！


あなたの受講をお待ちしております。


追伸


持ち家についての解説も追加しました。ご自宅の火災保険の見直しの参考になさってくださいね。

courses.description:
Bienvenue dans notre formation sur la création et le fonctionnement d’une Société civile immobilière (SCI). Nous allons explorer les fondements de la SCI, son rôle dans la gestion de biens immobiliers et les étapes nécessaires pour créer et faire fonctionner une SCI de manière optimale et pertinente.
Sachez avant toute chose qu’une Société civile immobilière est une forme juridique utilisée pour détenir et gérer des biens immobiliers, que ce soit des propriétés résidentielles, commerciales ou industrielles. Elle offre de nombreux avantages, tels que la limitation des responsabilités des associés, la possibilité de faciliter la transmission du patrimoine et la flexibilité dans la gestion des biens. Ce sont donc tous ces aspects fondamentaux que nous allons aborder, en commençant par l’examen des caractéristiques principales de la SCI, ses avantages et ses inconvénients par rapport à d’autres formes juridiques.
Nous nous consacrerons ensuite aux différentes étapes de création d’une SCI, à savoir les démarches nécessaires à sa création, y compris la rédaction des statuts, l’immatriculation auprès des autorités compétentes et les obligations légales.
Nous aurons besoin d’un module entier pour explorer les règles relatives à la gestion de la SCI : statut fiscal et social, pouvoir de décision des associés, financement, garanties, etc. La fiscalité et les avantages fiscaux liés à une SCI, seront étudiés en détail, notamment la déclaration des revenus fonciers, les possibilités de défiscalisation et les avantages de l’impôt sur les sociétés.
Enfin, nous examinerons les modalités de départ d’une SCI, et découvrirons des cas pratiques bien utiles pour découvrir différentes situations que l’on peut rencontrer au cours de la vie d’une SCI.
Cette formation vous fournira les connaissances nécessaires pour créer et gérer efficacement une SCI. Préparez-vous à acquérir les compétences nécessaires pour naviguer dans le domaine passionnant de l’immobilier en société !
target_audience: Cette formation s’adresse à tous ceux qui souhaitent créer ou entrer dans une Société civile immobilière.

requirements: No prior knowledge or skill required!
Anyone, new or experience, will benefit from this course!
courses.description:
In this course, I'll teach you how to systematically attract, recruit, train, and manage a vast number of birddogs who will find the Real Estate deals you are looking for.
There's no better way to duplicated your acquisitions efforts than to train people who can go out and find deals on houses for you.
It takes time, skill, and perseverance to build a successful Real Estate business, and there's no better way to grow your business than to enlist the help of others.
Truth of the matter is that there are thousands of people right now, in your market, who would love the opportunity to make some extra money by searching out house deals for you. The trick is how to go about finding those people, and training them up so that they can work effectively.
It takes a system to build an army of birddogs - and I'd like to show you how to build the same system that I use to grow my business like never before.
Once your system is built, all you have to do is focus on the front and and the back end -
On the front end, you have to keep the doors open so that your prospective birddogs can find you and enroll in your educational system. It's easy, and I'll show you exactly how.
On the back end you have to keep the deals headed towards the closing table. Once your birddogs and trained and bringing you solid deals, the closings will occur naturally.
So, enroll in the course. The cost is low, the material is delivered in step-by-step fashion, and you can literally be recruiting your army of birddogs by this time tomorrow.
ENROLL NOW.
target_audience: Anyone who desires more incoming Real Estate leads
Any investor who wants to take their business to the next level
Anyone who is suffering from a lack of motivated seller leads.

requirements: Conhecimentos básicos dos cursos de Engenharia Civil, Construção de Edifícios, Arquitetura ou Edificações.
courses.description:
A principal diferença entre um projeto desenvolvido em BIM ou em CAD, é justamente a capacidade de armazenar dados e informações referentes a construção da obra em um modelo digital. Na figura abaixo você pode ver na camada da “alvenaria” informações como, altura, espessura, blocos, pavimento, etc.. Poderiam ainda ser adicionadas várias outras informações conforme a metodologia construtiva adotada e conforme necessidade do usuário, como por exemplo dados do fabricante do material, dentre outros.
Também costuma-se dizer que alguns objetos BIM são ‘inteligentes’ porque podem conter informações sobre a sua ‘relação com outros elementos’ e componentes de um modelo. Assim, se o usuário alterar, por exemplo, a espessura de uma parede onde está inserida uma porta (elemento 3D BIM paramétrico e inteligente), mudando a espessura de 15 cm para 25 cm, o elemento 3D porta é capaz de ‘sofrer’ essa alteração e se ajustar, aumentando a largura de alguns dos seus componentes, automaticamente, reagindo e se adequando à nova configuração, e mantendo assim a consistência técnica e a coerência construtiva do modelo BIM.

Nesse curso você vai trabalhar com o planejamento 4D de um projeto estrutural de 15 pavimentos.

A partir dos arquivos de Estrutura e do Cronograma da Obra que você receberá, você irá entender como fazer um planejamento da obra e simular a construção virtual conforme ela será executada no canteiro de obras.

Você vai dominar o planejamento 4D e a execução da estrutura de concreto e não apenas um simples cronograma.

Vou te apresentar como elaborar de forma correta um planejamento 4D assertivo para uma obra de estruturas de concreto de grande porte .

No curso você aprenderá a criar um Planejamento BIM 4D de duas formas, a primeira somente com o Navisworks, após essa etapa você vai aprender a criar o Planejamento BIM4D importando um cronograma existente do MS-Project.

Mesmo que você não tenha experiência com obras não tem problema, pois o passo a passo desse curso vai inclusive lhe ajudar a entender as etapas construtivas.
target_audience: Estudantes e Profissionais nas áreas de Construção Civil e Arquitetura

courses.description:
O curso Vendas Imobiliárias: Treinamento Completo para Corretores é uma oportunidade singular, um mergulho profundo no cenário imobiliário que visa fortalecer as competências essenciais. Este curso dinâmico representa mais do que simplesmente aprimorar técnicas de fechamento; ele é uma jornada que prioriza a construção e sustentação de relacionamentos sólidos com os clientes. Através de ferramentas essenciais e estratégias robustas, busca-se não apenas vender, mas estabelecer laços de confiança e conexões duradouras.
Cada módulo é meticulosamente desenhado, resultando em um conjunto de conhecimentos práticos e estratégias validadas. Aqui, o objetivo não se limita a impulsionar vendas; é também elevar a satisfação do cliente, compreendendo suas necessidades de maneira mais profunda e satisfatória. Com um foco inabalável na busca pela excelência profissional, este treinamento não apenas capacita, mas inspira os participantes a se destacarem em um mercado altamente competitivo.
Os participantes são equipados não somente para vender mais, mas para alcançar resultados excepcionais em suas trajetórias como corretores de imóveis. Este treinamento é um catalisador para a transformação e crescimento profissional, estimulando uma mentalidade de constante evolução e adaptação.
Ao encarar um mercado imobiliário em constante mudança, este treinamento não é apenas uma oportunidade, mas a  pedra fundamental para expandir os potenciais individuais. Aqueles que buscam não apenas sucesso, mas excelência, encontrarão aqui a ferramenta essencial para alcançar seus objetivos.
Prepare-se para essa jornada, onde cada conhecimento adquirido é um degrau a mais na escalada para o sucesso. Este treinamento é a chave que desbloqueia o potencial latente e impulsiona não apenas suas habilidades, mas também seu sucesso duradouro no competitivo mercado imobiliário.

Bonjour,


Nous vous offrons le module "gestion de visite" de notre formation "vendeur immobilier" destinée aux personnes souhaitant vendre leur bien immobilier sans agence immobilière.


Vous trouverez tous nos coachings sur hellobien fr.


Nous sommes une plateforme qui accompagne les particuliers dans la vente ou l'achat de leur bien immobilier. Nous vous invitons à nous suivre sur nos réseaux sociaux @hellobien (Tiktok, Youtube, Instagram, Facebook) pour découvrir tous nos conseils gratuits et entrer dans la communauté.


Notre application vous permettra de mettre en ligne votre bien en vente et de trouver un acheteur sérieux sans agence immobilière. Nos vendeurs n'ont qu'une seule mission: Réaliser les visites et attendre l'offre d'achat. Nous nous occupons du reste. Nos vendeurs n'ont aucun appel à gérer et ne subissent aucun démarchage commercial d'agent immobilier notamment.


Nous avons constaté depuis notre lancement que les vendeurs appliquant notre méthode obtiennent une offre d'achat sur leurs biens immobiliers en moins d'un mois sans agence immobilière.


Pour en savoir plus, retrouvez nous sur nos réseaux, site web ou app. Nous vous invitons à nous contacter pour vous accompagner dans votre vente.


PS: Nous sommes gratuit et il n'y a pas de commission sur les transactions immobilières sur Hellobien.


A bientôt,


L'équipe Hellobien

courses.description:
„კომერციული უძრავი ქონება: გახდი OfficeZ-ის ბროკერი“ არის ყოვლისმომცველი, პრაქტიკულ ცოდნაზე ორიენტირებული კურსი, რომელიც შექმნილია მათთვის, ვისაც სურს სწრაფი და წარმატებული კარიერა კომერციული უძრავი ქონების სფეროში. ეს კურსი აერთიანებს როგორც თეორიულ ცოდნას, ისე პრაქტიკულ უნარებს, რაც საშუალებას აძლევს სტუდენტებს გახდნენ პროფესიონალური ბროკერები, რომლებიც შეუძლიათ დამოუკიდებლად მართონ წარმატებული გარიგებები.
კურსის განმავლობაში სტუდენტები შეისწავლიან კომერციული ქონების ძირითადი კატეგორიები — საოფისე, საცალო, ინდუსტრიული და საინვესტიციო ობიექტები. ისინი გაეცნობიან ქონების შეფასების მეთოდებს, ფასის ფორმირების სტრატეგიებს, ფინანსური ანალიზის და საინვესტიციო შესაძლებლობების შეფასების ხელსაწყოებს. სტუდენტები ასევე ისწავლიან ბაზრის კვლევის პროცესს, კონკურენტული გარემოს ანალიზს და სწორ გადაწყვეტილებებზე დაფუძნებულ პროფესიულ რეკომენდაციებს კლიენტებისთვის.
განსაკუთრებული ყურადღება ეთმობა პრაქტიკულ უნარებს: როგორ მოიპოვოთ კლიენტები, როგორ წარმოადგინოთ ობიექტები მიმზიდველი და სანდო ფორმით, როგორ აწარმოოთ მოლაპარაკებები და დახუროთ გარიგებები მაქსიმალურად ეფექტურად. კურსი ასწავლის ასევე სამართლებრივ და ეთიკურ სტანდარტებს, რომლებიც აუცილებელია ბროკერის პროფესიონალური საქმიანობისთვის.
სტუდენტები მონაწილეობენ რეალურ ბიზნეს-ქეისებზე დაფუძნებულ სავარჯიშოებში, სწავლობენ როგორ მართონ კლიენტებთან ურთიერთობა, როგორ შექმნან ძლიერი პროფესიული ქსელი და როგორ აამაღლონ საკუთარი ბრენდი ბაზარზე. კურსის დასრულების შემდეგ ისინი მზად იქნებიან დამოუკიდებლად განახორციელონ გარიგებები, ეფექტურად მართონ კომერციული ქონების პროექტები და გახდნენ ბროკერები OfficeZ-ში.
ეს კურსი არის თქვენი კარიერული სტარტი კომერციული უძრავი ქონების სამყაროში, რომელიც გაძლევთ ცოდნას, პრაქტიკულ უნარებს და პროფესიულ თვითრწმენას, რათა კონკურენტულ ბაზარზე წარმატებულად იფუნქციონიროთ და მიაღწიოთ მაღალ შედეგებს.

მზად ხარ შეისწავლო საქმე და გახდე OfficeZ-ის ბროკერი? მაშინ დავიწყოთ.
target_audience: Beginner commercial real estate brokers who've recently joined OfficeZ

courses.title: Airbnb Management Workshop - Umsatz steigern & Zeit sparen
courses.bio: Erstelle das beste Listing deiner Stadt. Bekomme bessere Reviews, optimiere die Preise & automatisiere alle Abläufe
objectives: Wie du eines der besten Airbnb-Listings in deiner Stadt erstellst
Wie du höhere Preise verlangst ohne deine Auslastung zu verringern
Wie du mehr positive Bewertungen von deinen Gästen bekommst
Wie du negative Bewertungen deiner Gäste vermeidest
Wie du die Kommunikation mit deinen Gästen zu 90% automatisierst

Positive Bewertungen bekommen: Negative Bewertungen nützen, um besser zu werden
Warum du ein Gästebuch auflegen solltest
Die optimale Preisstrategie: Welche Preise ziehen welche Gäste an?
Welchen Preis verlangen, wenn du noch keine Bewertungen hast?
Wie ermittelst du den optimalen Preis für dich?
Wie funktioniert die Preisstrategie von Hotels?
So funktioniert das Tool Beyond Pricing

Auf anderen Buchungsplattformen vermiete: Auf mehreren Plattformen vermieten - Vor- und Nachteile
Häufig gestellte Fragen: Mit welchen Anfangskosten musst du rechnen?
Welche typischen Fehler solltest du vermeiden?
Solltest du Übernachtungen für eine Nacht erlauben?

Solltest du dein Listing für Geschäftsreisende optimieren?
Kannst du Geld mit Zusatzaktivitäten generieren?

requirements: Ein existierendes Airbnb-Listing
courses.description:
Planst du auf Airbnb oder ähnlichen Plattformen wir Booking oder HomeAway dein Apartment zu vermieten? Willst du vielleicht sogar Apartments mieten, nur um sie an Kurzzeit-Gäste weiterzuvermieten?
Egal ob du schon Host bist oder erst in der Planungsphase bist: In diesem Kurs wirst du lernen, wie dein Apartment zum besten Listing deiner Stadt wird. Auf Airbnb, aber auch auf allen anderen Buchungsplattformen.
Ich werde dir nicht nur zeigen, wie du dein Listing startklar machst und gute Bewertungen bekommst, sondern auch wie du deinen optimalen Preis ermittelst und alle Abläufe des Apartment-Business möglichst automatisierst, sodass du am Ende des Tages mehr Geld zum Leben einnimmst, aber auch mehr Zeit hast, um den wahren Interessen deines Lebens nachzugehen.
Dieser Kurs wird dir praktisches Wissen vermitteln, dass du sofort in der Praxis umsetzen kannst.
Ich selbst vermiete seit 2+ Jahren mehrere Kurzzeitapartments in meiner Heimatstadt Wien. Seit 2 Jahren bin ich außerdem ich durchgehend Superhost (auch wenn ich dir im Kurs zeigen werde, warum du kein Superhost sein musst, um mit Airbnb Erfolg zu haben).
Ich zeige dir in diesem Kurs mein gesamtes Wissen, dass ich in der Zeit als Host erwerben konnte und hoffe, dass du von diesen Videos bestmöglich profitieren kannst!
Wir sehen uns im Kurs,
Philipp
target_audience: Apartment-Kurzzeitvermieter

courses.description:
행복한 인생 2막을 위한 4050의 온라인 강의 전문가, 인클입니다.
저희는 인생의 3대 고민인 돈, 건강, 행복이라는 대주제를 중심으로 여러분의 인생 2막 준비를 함께 고민하고 해결하고자 합니다! 인클의 강의와 함께 자신의 열정과 힘을 믿으세요.
당신이 원하는 무엇이든 이룰 수 있게 인생2막 클래스는 언제나 당신을 도울게요. 스스로 확고한 신념과 의지를 다지세요.
이 강의에서 배울 내용은 다음과 같습니다.


1.소개 영상


2.부동산 내 손으로 내 건물 짓기 시작도 끝도 결국은 토지


3.부동산 신축이냐 리모델링이냐 용도 변경이냐 결국은 가성비가 문제로다


4.설계 드디어 나도 건물주! 사업성 검토부터 매수까지


5.금융 빌딩 투자의 꽃


6.시공 다양한 분쟁에서 승리하기, 추가 견적, 하자 ,매도 계약 시 유의사항


7.세무 절세 비법


8.시공 비교 견적 씹어 먹기


9.설계 아무리 강조해도 지나치지 않는 설계 관리의 중요성


10. 사례 분석 (단독 주택, 듀플렉스)


11. 사례 분석 (꼬마 빌딩-1)


12. 사례 분석 (꼬마 빌딩-2)

courses.title: Multi Family Investing: How to start today
courses.bio: Everything you need to know to obtain your first deal

Multi Family Investing: How to get started? Contract to Close
How to find rental comps after a rehab? Determining ARV.

requirements: Desire to want to invest in multi family properties
courses.description: If you have a desire to start building passive income, and generational wealth thru multi family investing, this is your one stop course, and instructor resource to start investing today. Learn hands on how to analyze a property, and all terminology needed to acquire a property. What is an ideal investment property in today's market with rising interest? Learn how to identify your own strengths and weaknesses, and how to help build those skills. Did you know you might not even need any capital of your own? Understand your own worth when it comes to real estate investing, with no experience necessary. Build a checklist on what you need to start today from a financing perspective, and why I believe multi-family is the best investment today in real estate. I am offering myself as a direct resource for those of you who are ready to make an investment in the next 2-3 months. I am an investor and a realtor that has an investment property, and helps dozens of investors acquire a variety of types of investments. I do not teach anything I have not already done. If you want to stop watching YouTube videos, and actually learn how to do it, and want to start taking action this is the course for you.
target_audience: Multi Family Investors

courses.title: Ausztriai ingatlan vásárlás és ingatlan befektetés
courses.bio: Lépésről lépésre útmutató az ausztriai ingatlan vásárláshoz, ingatlan befektetéshez
objectives: Teljes útmutató ausztriai ingatlan vásárláshoz és befektetéshez
Részletes folyamatleírás, hogy lehet biztonságosan ingatlant vásárolni és befektetni Ausztriában

Miről és kinek szól a videó szeminárium?: Ezen videó sziminárium életmentő lehet, mint egy biztosítás!
Ingatlanvásárlás Ausztriában - Lépésről: Stratégia - Mi a cél, mit akarok eléni?

requirements: Előzetes tudás nem szükséges
courses.description:
Idegesen nézzük, ahogyan olvad el a pénzünk!
Az emberek többé vagy kevésbé megtanulták, hogyan lehet pénzt keresni. Erről szól a legtöbb guru, tanácsadó, MLM, és online tréning. Azonban egyik se említi azt, hogy hogyan lehet a megkeresett pénzt megtartani. Vannak ugyan befektetési tréningek, de ezek többsége inkább a spekulációk, a gyors pénz megkeresését tanítja, nem a megtakarításai értékének megtartását és azok gyarapítását.
Ezért van az, hogy a középosztály egyre inkább eltűnik, és jó eséllyel szegényen fog nyugdíjba menni és meghalni. Középosztály legnagyobb problémája nem a jövedelem, hanem a vagyon megtartás. A csábító ajánlatokkal teli fogyasztói világban, mindenki modern, jómódú és büszke akar lenni. Ezért költ, ahogy a reklám mondja neki.
Ma már nem divatos a „lassú” ingatlanbefektetés. Nincs vele sok munka, nem izgalmas, évtizedekben telik, hogy meghozza az eredményét. Persze ezt csak azok gondolhatják, akik nem értenek hozzá, és fogalmuk sincs, hogy hogyan lehet egy vagyont építeni ingatlanokból.
Szerencsére egyre többen jönnek rá arra, hogy Ausztriába nemcsak síelni, vagy nem csak olcsó munkaerőnek érdemes menni, hanem ingatlanbefektetőnek is. Ugyan eddig alacsonyabbak voltak a hozamok, mint Magyarországon, de folyamatosan növekvőek, és nem mutatnak olyan ingadozást, mint a magyar piac az elmúlt 15 évében.
Ezért aki az ingatlan befektetést hosszú távú játéknak tekinti, annak az egyik legfontosabb körülmény a biztonság. A biztonság, ami sok esetben felülírja a hozam elvárások igényét, és inkább választja a biztonságos és tartósan stabil befektetést, mint a kockázatos és esetleg több profitot hozó spekulációt.
Nagy kérdés viszont, hogy hogyan induljunk el egy számunkra teljesen ismeretlen piacon. Ahol nem ismerjük a nyelvet, ahol nem ismerjük a szokásokat, ahol nem tudjuk, hogy hogyan tudunk jól befektetni. Így a legtöbben kihagyják azt a lehetőséget, amit Ausztria kínál az ingatlan befektetések terén.
Ezen információ hiánypótlására hoztam létre, több mint tízéves ingatlanbefektetési és ingatlanközvetítői tapasztalattal egy tananyagot, amely A tól Z ig mindent áttekint az ausztriai ingatlan vásárlással kapcsolatban.
Büszkén mondhatom, hogy beleírtam egy profi minden tudását, amivel akár ingatlanos nélkül is kiváló és kockázatmentes vételeket lehet elérni. A tananyag belemegy a jogi, adózási, és kockázati kérdésekben is. Ez a tananyag tekinthető akár biztonsági övnek azok számára, akik Ausztriában ingatlant akarnak vásárolni.
Akkor is fel nyithatja az ember szemét, ha eddig eszébe se jutott még, vagy csak még tervezi, hogy Ausztriában ingatlant vásároljon a közeljövőben.
„A tudás mutatja meg a lehetőségeket, és hozza el a motivációt a cselekedethez.”
Ebben a szellemben készült ezen teljeskörű tananyag is.
Kezdd el most megismerni az ausztriai ingatlan vásárlás titkait, hogyan tuds kiváló befektetés vásárolni Ausztriában. Ezen tananyag garantáltan segít abban, hogy elkerüljük a tipikus csapdákat, amibe nagyon sok magyar, aki saját feje után megy, beleesik.
Már túl sokszor hallottam ezt a mondatot ügyfelektől:
„Parajdi úr, csak előre tudtam volna azt, ami ebben a tananyagba benne van akkor nem csinálok egy nagy hülyeséget!”
Sok sikert kívánok és találkozunk a tananyag videóiban!
target_audience: Ingatlan befektetők
Ingatlanfejlesztők
Passzív jövedelmet keresők

courses.title: IA pour l’immobilier : formation complète
courses.bio: Maitriser l’IA de A à Z, Investir en immobiler avec l’IA, L’IA pour investir en immobilier
objectives: Chapitre 1 : Introduction à l'IA et à ses applications dans l'immobilier
Chapitre 2 : Prédiction des prix immobiliers avec l’IA
Chapitre 3 : Automatisation de la gestion des biens immobiliers
Chapitre 4 : L'IA dans la recherche immobilière personnalisée
Chapitre 5 : Optimisation des investissements

L’IA pour investir: Introduction à l'IA et à ses applications dans l'immobilier
Prédiction des prix immobiliers avec l’IA
Automatisation de la gestion des biens immobiliers
L'IA dans la recherche immobilière personnalisée
Optimisation des investissements immobiliers avec l’IA

requirements: Aucun prérequis
courses.description:
Dans ce cours, nous allons exploré en profondeur l'impact transformateur de l'intelligence artificielle (IA) sur le secteur immobilier. En partant de la prédiction des prix de l'immobilier, qui permet aux investisseurs et aux professionnels du secteur de mieux anticiper les fluctuations du marché, jusqu'à l'automatisation des processus complexes de gestion des biens, l'IA devient un allié stratégique incontournable. Les outils basés sur l'IA ne se contentent pas de faciliter les tâches quotidiennes, mais offrent également la possibilité de prendre des décisions plus éclairées grâce à l'analyse de données massives et complexes. Ces outils sont capables d'analyser des milliers de variables en temps réel pour fournir des prévisions plus précises sur les tendances du marché, les comportements des locataires, et même sur les investissements les plus rentables.
L'IA optimise également les opérations internes des entreprises immobilières, réduisant les coûts et les délais de gestion des propriétés. Par exemple, des systèmes d'automatisation sont désormais utilisés pour la gestion des baux, la maintenance prédictive des bâtiments, et même l'analyse de la rentabilité des investissements. Cela permet non seulement de libérer du temps pour les professionnels, mais aussi de garantir une efficacité accrue dans les processus de gestion et d'administration. En somme, l'IA révolutionne véritablement le secteur immobilier en offrant des avantages considérables, tels qu'une meilleure précision dans les prédictions de marché, des gains de temps considérables et des opportunités d’optimisation dans tous les aspects du secteur, qu'il s'agisse de la gestion des biens ou de l'analyse des tendances économiques et sociales. Ces avancées technologiques ouvrent également la voie à une nouvelle ère de personnalisation des services, où les offres immobilières sont de plus en plus adaptées aux besoins spécifiques des clients et des investisseurs.
target_audience: Tout public

courses.title: 【福祉住環境2級：250問収録！全問解説付き】福祉住環境コーディネータ2級 合格口座！全問解説付で基礎知識を習得！
courses.bio: 福祉住環境コーディネータ2級に合格するための問題集講座です。福祉住環境コーディネータ2級の合格のために必要な知識を公式テキストの章立てに合わせて、体系的/網羅的に学ぶことができます。
objectives: 福祉住環境コーディネーター2級に関する基礎知識
高齢者や障がい者に対して住みやすい住環境を提案するための基礎知識
医療・福祉・建築について体系的で幅広い知識
介護サービス利用者とその家族の潜在的なニーズをくみ取るために必要な知識
居住者ごとに千差万別な住環境へのニーズに対して提案・実現するための具体的な方法

はじめに: 福祉住環境コーディネーター2級 合格講座について
福祉住環境コーディネーター2級について
福祉住環境コーディネーター2級 試験概要

requirements: 福祉住環境コーディネーター検定試験や、医療・福祉・介護・建築に興味があればどなたでも受講いただけます
courses.description:
福祉住環境コーディネーター検定試験 2級の取得を目指す方に向けて、試験対策を支援するための問題集コースとなります。
福祉住環境コーディネーターは、高齢者や障がい者を含むさまざまな利用者のニーズに応え、適切な居住環境を提供するために重要な役割を果たしています。


この問題集は、福祉住環境コーディネーター検定試験 2級の基本知識を習得できるように、公式テキストの重要部分をカバーする形で構成しています。内容についてはできる限りシンプルにし、かつ効率的にポイントを学習できるようにしています。


本問題集を通じて、福祉住環境コーディネーターに関する知識の向上や意識の変革を促進し、業務への実践に向けて一歩を踏み出すお手伝いができれば幸いです。


コースの内容は公式テキストの章立てに合わせた以下の6章で構成されています。


1章 高齢者や障害者を取り巻く社会状況
2章 障害のとらえ方と自立支援のあり方
3章 疾患別・障害別の福祉住環境整備
4章 相談援助の考え方と福祉住環境整備
5章 福祉住環境整備の技術及び知識
6章 在宅生活における福祉用具の活用
target_audience: 福祉住環境コーディネーター2級の基礎知識を習得したい方
医療・福祉・介護・建築に興味がある方。その中でも特にケアマネジャーや福祉用具専門相談員の方に最適なコースです。

courses.title: Leilão de Imóveis da CAIXA
courses.bio: Segredos e dicas valiosas para aumentar suas chances de fazer as melhores arrematações dos Leilões de Imóveis da CAIXA
objectives: Conhecerá os 6 tipos de leilões da Caixa e como encontrar e arrematar as melhores oportunidades de acordo com cada modalidade.

DESOCUPAÇÃO DO IMÓVEL: Vale a pena comprar um imóvel ocupado?

requirements: Não há.
courses.description:
Você já pensou em como poderia mudar sua vida financeira adquirindo um imóvel com grandes descontos? Com o nosso curso online sobre leilões e vendas da Caixa Econômica Federal, essa realidade está mais próxima do que você imagina. Aprenda passo a passo como arrematar imóveis com descontos que podem chegar até 90%!
Neste curso, vamos desmistificar as diversas modalidades de leilões e licitações que a Caixa oferece. Você entenderá cada etapa do processo de compra, desde a pesquisa inicial até a finalização da compra. Com uma abordagem prática e acessível, você se sentirá confiante para navegar neste universo e aproveitá-lo ao máximo. Não importa se você é um iniciante ou já tem alguma experiência; nosso conteúdo é projetado para atender a todos.
Imagine-se adquirindo sua casa própria ou até mesmo investindo em um imóvel para aluguel. Com o conhecimento que você adquirirá, será possível tomar decisões estratégicas e aumentar seu patrimônio de forma significativa. Nossa missão é ajudar você a transformar um sonho em realidade, oferecendo estratégias e dicas que realmente funcionam.
Não perca tempo e não deixe essa oportunidade escapar! Inscreva-se hoje e inicie sua jornada em direção a um futuro financeiro mais seguro e promissor. O seu caminho para conquistar a casa própria e investir de forma inteligente começa aqui. Faça parte desta transformação e descubra como você também pode atingir seus objetivos de forma eficaz!
target_audience: Investidores, corretores de imóveis e todos aqueles com poucos recursos que querem viabilizar a compra da casa própria financiada.

courses.title: The Serviced Accommodation: From Zero to Booking in 1 Day!
courses.bio: Skyrocket Your SA Income
requirements: There are no specific skills or prior experience required to take this course. All you need is a computer and basic ability to use it—such as browsing the internet, opening files, and typing. We’ve designed this course with beginners in mind, so we will guide you step-by-step through everything you need to learn. Whether you're starting from scratch or looking to build new skills, we’re here to support you every step of the way.
courses.description:
Are you tired of "gurus" who don't run actual serviced accommodation businesses? Most courses are taught by people who DON'T actively manage properties, leaving you with outdated information and unrealistic promises. It's time to learn from the real specialists.


Imagine landlords handing you the keys to £1.5 million flats by earning 20-30% more rent than long lets with your service with just a few hours of work per week. That's the power of our proven system, led by industry pioneer Jahangir Guseynov. With 9 years of active serviced accommodation management and a 95% client retention rate, we don't just tell you about it – we show you how to DO it.

What's Included In The Modules:
- Comprehensive 13-module online course for serviced accommodation success
- Master fundamentals and leverage cutting-edge tools (Airbnb Analyzer, AI)
- Learn proven strategies for sourcing deals, financing, marketing, and operations
- Navigate common challenges and maximize earnings through affiliate partnerships
- Ideal for beginners and experienced professionals looking to scale their business

This Exclusive Opportunity is Perfect for You if:
- You're ready to scale your existing SA units to the next level
- You're seeking high-level support and networking with like-minded peers
- You're committed to accelerating your growth and taking your SA business to new heights
target_audience: Anyone who wants to become successful in the serviced accommodation business.

courses.bio: やるだけムダなこと・やってはいけないことを避けていち早く成功を手に入れよう!!

不動産投資の落とし穴: 不動産投資で勉強するだけムダな分野×優先して勉強したい分野
不動産投資で値切るだけムダな経費×値切っても良い経費＆入会してはいけない投資塾の５つのダメパターン
自分の頭の中だけで考えてはいけない×ネットやYouTubeや書籍にない答えの探し方５つの例

requirements: 不動産投資に興味があること
courses.description:
2008年から東京大家塾（大家さん向けの勉強会）を主宰し、およそ３万件を超える相談に対応してきた経験から、不動産投資で「勉強するだけムダな分野」「値切るだけムダな経費」「自分の頭の中だけで考えてはいけない」ことについてレクチャーします。
いまやネットやYouTubeや書籍で無料〜少額で不動産投資のノウハウが手に入ります。ですが、私の相談事例から言うと「え？ そんなの勉強する意味あるの？」という分野が少なからずあります。もちろん趣味で勉強するのなら私がとやかく言う立場にありませんが、達成したい目的があり、いち早くたどり着きたいのなら、そんな遠回りすることはないのに...という相談者が後を絶ちません。
次に、経費削減の相談も多くあります。ですが「え？ そこの経費をケチっちゃダメでしょ！」という分野があります。こちらも達成したい目的があり、いち早くたどり着きたいのなら、目先のわずかな支出を削減することで遠回りしてしまうことがあります。
最後は「え？ そんなことで悩んでいるの？」という事例が多いことです。もちろん相談者はマシな方です。私に相談してきた時点で「自分では解決できない」と諦めて（？）外部に頼る決断をしたからです。しかし、多くの方はネットやYouTubeや書籍で答えを探そうとします。ところが当然ながら「自分の問題にカスタマイズされた答え」はないのです。そうはいっても「自分で調べる」「自分の頭で考える」ことは大切なことです。あとは、どこまで調べて考えてダメだったら外部の頭脳に頼る（個別相談をする）のか、明確な線を引く（基準を持つ）ことです。
この３つのレクチャーは、分かってしまえば、どれもカンタンなことです。しかし、多くの方...特に初心者〜中級者の方は陥りやすい問題で、行動が止まってしまったり、廻り道をしたりしがちです。
ぜひ、このコースを受講して、やるだけムダなこと・やってはいけないことを避けていち早く成功を手に入れて下さい。。
target_audience: 不動産投資に興味を持った初心者

Dicas essenciais para a elaboração de um bom relatório fotográfico
Como se portar durante a vistoria e como proceder em situações inusitadas ou adversas

Preparação para a vistoria: Como se preparar para a vistoria
Comportamento: Como se comportar durante uma vistoria

requirements: Não é necessário conhecimento prévio.
courses.description:
O curso de Vistoria de Imóveis urbanos é um treinamento completo e essencial para profissionais que desejam se qualificar na área de vistorias e avaliações de imóveis. Este curso oferece uma abordagem teórica e prática para a vistoria de imóveis urbanos, ensinando aos alunos todos os aspectos importantes que devem ser considerados durante a vistoria e avaliação.


O curso é baseado na norma brasileira NBR 14653, que é amplamente reconhecida como a principal referência para a avaliação de imóveis no Brasil. Com isso, os alunos aprendem as melhores práticas para realizar a vistoria, documentação e elaboração de laudos, garantindo assim uma avaliação precisa e confiável dos imóveis.


Além disso, o curso aborda tópicos importantes como a preparação ideal para a vistoria, comportamento durante o trabalho e como tirar o maior proveito da vistoria, realizando o trabalho com eficiência. Com isso, os alunos aprendem a realizar uma avaliação completa do imóvel, identificando possíveis problemas e fornecendo recomendações para solucioná-los.


O curso foi elaborado por instrutores altamente qualificados e experientes, que já contam com mais 2.000 laudos de avaliação de imóveis realizados em todo o território nacional e ampla experiência no treinamento de vistoriadores, proporcionando uma excelente oportunidade para que os alunos aprendam com os melhores profissionais do mercado. Com uma abordagem prática, o curso permite que os alunos apliquem imediatamente seus conhecimentos em suas atividades profissionais, melhorando assim a qualidade de seus serviços e a satisfação de seus clientes.


Em resumo, o curso de vistoria de imóveis urbanos que segue a NBR 14653 é uma excelente opção para profissionais que desejam se especializar em avaliação de imóveis, acompanhando o certificado de conclusão da plataforma Udemy.
target_audience: Profissionais do setor imobiliário, construção civil e avaliadores de imóveis, como engenheiros, arquitetos e corretores.

courses.title: Podstawy TRANSFORMACJI w DEWELOPERA
courses.bio: Od A do Z inwestycji deweloperskich: Kluczowe kroki do sukcesu
objectives: Przygotowanie do inwestycji deweloperskiej
Dlaczego warto realizować inwerstycje deweloperskie: zyski, czas i perspektywa
Transformacja pracownika etatu do dewelopera, jak robić to równolegle
Deweloperka na etacie, jak to zrobić
Znalezienie działki budowlanej pod inwestycją deweloperską
Projektowanie budynków - co, jak skala, jaki rodzaj.
Sposoby finansowania projektu deweloperskiego
Marketing inwestycji i zarządzanie sprzedażą
Podstawy jak wyliczać rentowność inwestycji deweloperskiej
Budowanie zespółu dewelopera - kto nam pomaga i jego obowiązki
Zarządzanie budową, obowiązki projektanta, inżyniera, kierownika
requirements: Podstawy wiedzy jak rozpocząć inwestycje deweloperską będąc na etacie.
Konieczna chęć do zmiany
courses.description:
Podstawy od A do Z czym jest inwestycja deweloperska.
Moduły warsztatu: .Jakie są zyski z deweloperski, na jakie możesz liczyć już przy pierwszym projekcie. Jaka skala projektu na początek i dlaczego.
Co potrzebujemy aby rozpocząć.
Główny mit zatrzymujący przed wejściem w nieruchomości do brak pieniędzy, ale czy to naprawdę jest bariera nie do pokonania? Ile finansów potrzebujemy na pierwszy projekt, jak finansować deweloperkę.
Jak podjeść do projektowania, jak projektować i z kim.
Jak zarządzać budową, kto zarządza, co i jak kontrolować, kto kontroluje. Komu można zaufać, a komu nie.
Jak sprzedawać, jak promować, co jest najważniejsze.
Czyli od A do Z aby pierwszy projekt deweloperski stał sie sukcesem. Nie ważne czy jesteś na etacie, dzięki prelegentowi Radomirowi Sejdakowi przejdziesz TRANSFORMACJĘ W DEWELOPERA. Wszystko od Radomira Sejdaka, dewelopera z doświadczeniem budowy bliźniaków i segmentów pod Warszawą w latach 2020-2024.
A zaczynamy od najważniejszego: zmiany nas. Aby podejść do swojej pierwszej inwestycji deweloperskiej potrzebna nam TRANSFORMACJA, potrzebna nam zmiana nas samych. Aby zmienić to gdzie jesteśmy, musimy zmienić siebie najpierw: uwierzyć że projekty deweloperskie są dla nas.  Jeśli marzyłeś o nieruchomościach to Radomir to przeszedł i tu sie z tobą podzieli. Sam przez 15 lat marzył aby zająć sie nieruchomościami.  Pracował na etacie i zajął się deweloperką, a potem inwestycjami w nieruchomości, flipami i nieruchomościami na wynajem.
Jeśli czujesz, że ta zyskowna droga jest dla ciebie to Radomir pomoże w przejściu drogi, którą sam przeszedł i wprowadzić sie na drogę TRANSFORMACJI w dewelopera.
target_audience: Specjaliści i manadżerowie firm
Pracownicy z branż około budowlanych: firmy budowlane, remontowe, instalacyjne, architekci

courses.description:
前言：
本課設計給給不把房子當成投資標的與自住的你，對擁有房子渴望已久，卻苦無計畫與方向；或是決定購屋，卻被坊間話術各種轟炸，已經開始選屋、找屋，但卻不知道購屋技巧？甚至打算換房，不知如何是好的者。

一、課程特色
1.從財務規劃到需求
釐清市場現況和自身評估

2.看房步驟與判讀
拆解房屋類型與注意事項

3.購屋與議價技巧
破解房仲話術與廣告令詞

4.查看契約與文件
學會各式契約重點和相關文書

5.從歷史角度看買賣時機
地點、時間、方法 一次搞定

二、課程大綱
(一)前言
1.買房好還是租房好？
2.購屋結合人生財務規劃
(二)買房必看的各大重點
1.地段、商圈選擇
2.該如何買間適合的房子
3.海砂屋、凶宅等如何避免
(三)房屋的類型
1.了解各種房屋類型
(與購買前的注意事項)
2.從新舊之分到類型之分
3.自住或投資時需了解的事
(四)現場看屋的知識集
1.晴天、雨天、白天、黑夜看房法
2.由內到外、由大而小的知識
(五)房市的景氣循環與買賣
1.了解台灣50年的房市景氣循環
2.買賣國內外的房市建言與應對
3.挑選自住、投資房、店面的技巧

三、內容精選
1.用四個面向思考與是否合適購屋
2.認識不同房屋潛在優勢與劣勢
3.現場看屋的重點與技巧
4.經典的房仲話術大公開
5.近五十年來的台灣房市發展與買賣時機重點

四、講師介紹
姓名：Jing!
學歷：
國立政治大學 地政學系

經歷：
1.前戴德梁行 不動產鑑價師
2.翔泰學校 Tai School - 房產研究員

courses.title: 기업의 성패를 좌우하는 요즘 대세의 소비트렌드_인싸의 시대
courses.bio: 최신 마케팅 트렌드에 관심 있는 직장인과 인플루언서를 활용한 마케팅 기법에 관심 있는 직장인을 위한 소비트렌드 파악
objectives: 요즘 시대의 핵심대중의 트렌드를 알 수 있다.
세상에 대한 감각을 늘릴 수 있다.
더 많은 수익을 창출하기 위한 전략을 수립할 수 있다.
요즘 시대의 핵심대중, 즉 인싸들의 소비트렌드를 바탕으로 각종 계획을 수립한다.

역주행, 대중이 주인공이 되는 시대: 미디어의 권력이 대중에게 넘어간 시대의 트렌드
미디어 플랫폼의 변화, 시작부터 세계를 노려라: 플랫폼의 현주소 대중들의 마음은 어디에 존재하나?
감성마케팅, 새로운 이미지를 창출하다: 기업과 대중 입장에서 감성 마케팅이 필요한 이유
성공적 감성 마케팅을 위한 요소 뭐가 있을까?
레트로 열풍, 끝날 때까지 끝난 게 아니다: 취향의 분화의 인싸를 향한 욕구 레트로 열풍에 불을 지피다

requirements: 본 과정을 위한 필수적인 사전 지식은 없습니다.
courses.description:
요즘 세상을 이해하고 싶은 모두를 위한 가장 완벽한 “요즘 세상 지침서”
인싸가 유행을 만들고, 소비의 흐름을 주도한다! 기업의 성패를 좌우하는 ‘요즘 대세’들의 소비트렌드! 그들의 지갑을 열어라! 이제 ‘인싸’와 ‘트렌드’를 아는 것은 경쟁력이다!
‘요즘 대세’는 소비트렌드를 알아내는데 가장 좋은 수단이다. 대중들은 당연히 대세에 돈을 쓰고 싶어 한다. 한물간 것과 인기 없는 것에 돈을 쓰고 싶은 사람은 없다. 힘들게 번 돈, 당연히 의미 있고 특별해지는 데 쓰고 싶은 게 사람의 마음이다. 그래서 의미와 주목을 부르는 소비는 대세에서 시작된다. 『인싸의 시대』는 지금 핫한 대세를 읽어내 대중들의 소비트렌드를 알고 싶은 사람들을 위한 과정이다.


학습내용:
1. 글로벌 인싸 BTS, 세계는 왜 그들에게 주목하는가?
2. 역주행, 대중이 주인공이 되는 시대
3. 미디어 플랫폼의 변화, 시작부터 세계를 노려라
4. 큐레이션, 너를 분석해 줄게
5. 1인칭 중심사회, ‘나’의 발견
6. 스토리텔링, 대중은 기억한다
7. ‘짤’, 짧은 순간의 마력
8. 덕업일치, 덕질이 인정받는 세상
9. 감성마케팅, 새로운 이미지를 창출하다
10. 레트로 열풍, 끝날 때까지 끝난 게 아니다

courses.bio: Investir en immobilier, Investir sans credit, investir pas chère, Gagner sans risque,
objectives: Comprendre l’opportunité d’investir à bas prix
Identifier les bonnes villes et quartiers pour un investissement rentable

Introduction: : Comprendre l’opportunité d’investir à bas prix
Identifier les bonnes villes et quartiers pour un investissement rentable
Sélectionner le bon bien immobilier à moins de 25 000 euros
Financer l’achat et effectuer les démarches
Rénover et louer pour maximiser la rentabilité

requirements: Aucun prérequis
courses.description:
Dans ce cours, nous allons explorer comment investir à bas prix dans l'immobilier, en mettant l'accent sur des biens à moins de 25 000 euros. À travers cinq chapitres détaillés, vous apprendrez comment identifier les meilleures opportunités, sélectionner les bons quartiers et biens, financer vos achats sans recourir au crédit, et maximiser la rentabilité grâce à la rénovation et à une gestion locative optimale.
Chapitre 1 : Nous commencerons par comprendre l’intérêt d’investir à bas prix, notamment les avantages comme moins de dépendance au crédit, une accessibilité accrue et des rendements intéressants, tout en prenant en compte les risques associés aux biens nécessitant des travaux ou des marchés volatils.
Chapitre 2 : Nous vous guiderons ensuite pour identifier les bonnes villes et quartiers où investir, en analysant des critères essentiels comme la demande locative, les prix au m², et en vous orientant vers des régions prometteuses.
Chapitre 3 : Une fois que vous avez trouvé la zone géographique idéale, nous discuterons de la manière de sélectionner le bien immobilier qui correspond à votre budget, en tenant compte de l’état du bien, de son emplacement et des coûts de rénovation.
Chapitre 4 : Nous aborderons ensuite les différentes options de financement pour acheter sans crédit, tout en détaillant le processus d’achat immobilier et les techniques pour négocier un prix attractif.
Chapitre 5 : Enfin, nous vous donnerons des clés pour rénover efficacement et louer votre bien de manière rentable, tout en vous offrant des conseils pratiques sur la gestion locative, le calcul des loyers et l’entretien des biens.
Bonus : Vous découvrirez les 10 outils incontournables pour optimiser vos investissements immobiliers et réussir dans ce domaine.
Ce cours vous fournira toutes les connaissances nécessaires pour investir de manière rentable et pérenne, même avec un budget limité.
target_audience: Tout public

courses.description: Buying a flat is a fabulous decision to make, regardless of whether your purchasing as a first time buyer, a mid life professional, a retired person a second home. or investor.  Trainee estate agents and property professional can also benefit from this course, as it will provide an insight into this area of the property world.  However, flat buying is far from simple as there are many important factors in the process which must be taken into consideration, that  can effect the ownership! This course will give you the knowledge to make an informed decision so that you can buy with confidence, and could help you save a considerable amount of  financial burdens, which you are legally bound!  The implications of buying a flat are so different to buying a house,  and not knowing what you are buying, and realizing after you have bought can be truly a daunting prospect!   Budgeting as well for a flat in the buying process and living costs after you have bought has also to be factored in.  The fact is so many flat  buyers do get it wrong, so by taking this course, it will enlighten you  whether to buy a flat and when you are searching the market, you'll  know what's a good buy and what's  not a good buy. The value of this course to any one who sits it is knowledge of the course author who has much  experience gained over the last 20 plus years.

courses.description:
Udemy otorga un Certificado de Finalización a todos los estudiantes que completen este Curso especializado en Captación Inmobiliaria Online.
¿Quieres vender una vivienda, un terreno, una oficina, un local comercial, o una nave industrial en la mitad de tiempo y con la mitad de presupuesto? ¿Quieres captar los mejores inmuebles o propiedades en tu zona o ciudad? Este curso te indica cómo conseguirlo.
Esta es la guía definitiva de los agentes inmobiliarios para captar online.
El Curriculum más abajo te muestra claramente que es un curso muy completo, diferente y cuyo contenido difícilmente lo encontrarás en otro curso inmobiliario online o presencial.
En este curso aprenderás:
Cómo otros agentes inmobiliarios están utilizando internet para captar nuevos clientes cada semana. Clientes cualificados interesados en comprar ahora.
Qué estrategias específicas de captación debe utilizar un agente inmobiliario en cada medio.
Cómo invertir menos presupuesto para conseguir más clientes creando un “embudo de ventas” ya testado por muchos agentes inmobiliarios.
Cómo fijar una estrategia de marketing online para crear un flujo de clientes y ventas todas las semanas.
Casos Prácticos Reales de los resultados que consiguen algunos agentes inmobiliarios aplicando las estrategias que mostramos aquí.
¿Por qué muchos agentes inmobiliarios no captan clientes cualificados online?
Porque esperan que sus clientes hagan algo que es confuso o que no quieren hacer. Consiguen un montón de visitantes a su sitio web, pero muy pocos solicitan información y las solicitudes son pobres.
Este curso te demuestra cómo cambiar esa situación y convertir tu negocio online en una flujo continuo de solicitudes de información. Aprenderás cual es el proceso real que siguen tus potenciales clientes online para pedir información sobre un inmueble; por qué siguen este proceso y cómo puedes motivarlos para que te pidan información a ti en vez de a la competencia.
Vas a descubrir nuevos métodos para conseguir que te encuentren online personas que están interesadas en comprar, alquilar o vender cualquier inmueble o propiedad en tu zona o ciudad. Que encuentren los artículos de tu blog, tus vídeos, tus comentarios en redes sociales, tus inmuebles y tu servicio inmobiliario. Que te pidan información y te faciliten su teléfono.
Este es el curso que necesitas para captar con éxito online.
target_audience: Todas aquellas personas que no trabajan en el sector inmobiliario, pero saben que este sector les puede proporcionar la estabilidad financiera que buscan.

Toda persona que trabaje en una agencia inmobiliaria o en una promotora y no esté directamente relacionada con las ventas.

courses.description:
Commercial real estate is a foundational asset in the portfolio of the majority of world's wealthiest people. But for the average individual investor, owning commercial property can be very intimidating. In this course, you'll discover how you can become a commercial real estate investor from the author of Commercial Real Estate Investing for Dummies Peter Harris. The confusing terminology and complicated transactions will be simplified so that anyone can understand the many different facets of commercial real estate and how the "little guy", the individual investor, can win big. And ultimately, how owning commercial real estate can be your ticket to lasting financial freedom (where your passive income exceeds your monthly expenses).
You'll discover:
How and why anyone can become a commercial real estate investor.
The different types of asset classes and which ones are best for individual investors (and which ones NOT to compete with the Big Boys on).
How to evaluate a property quickly and easily so that you know when to hold them and when to fold them.
The many pitfalls that investors in the past have fallen into and how you can avoid them.
Secrets to successfully building generational wealth.
Tips for specific asset classes (apartments, self storage facilities, mobile home parks, shopping centers and office buildings)
And MUCH, much more
This course was designed for the beginner who either has interest in getting into commercial real estate investment or owns a property or two. As the Education Director of Commercial Property Advisors, Peter Harris shares wisdom that will save you several years in learning lessons the hard way.
target_audience: Those interested or curious in becoming a commercial real estate investor at some point in their life.

courses.title: Améliorer la rentabilité de vos investissements Immobiliers
courses.bio: Gestion des actifs Immobiliers | Real estate Asset Management
objectives: Prospecter et repérez l'actif immobilier le plus rentable grâce aux techniques d'analyses financières de rentabilité que vous allez maitriser
Analysez la rentabilité d'un investissement immobilier (calcul de la VAN, du TRI et du Cash Multiple, ...) et choix du meilleur investissement
Surveiller et améliorer la rentabilité de votre investissement immobilier selon les normes internationales d'Asset Management
Décider du meilleur moment de sortie de l'investissement dans l'objectif de maximiser la rentabilité de l'opération et passer à un nouvel investissement
Maitrisez les différentes stratégies de sortie d'un investissement immobilier
Évaluez sereinement pas à pas n'importe quels types de biens immobiliers comme un professionnel (appartements, terrains, immeubles de rapport, etc.)
Maitrisez la modélisation Excel et utilisez les modèles financiers fournis dans cette formation pour modéliser vos prochains investissements
Différencier entre les métiers suivants : portfolio manager | Asset manager | Property manager | Facility manager

Introduction: Présentation de la formation d'Asset Management Immobilier
Qu'allons nous découvrir - Cycle de l'Asset Management Immobilier

Stratégie de Sortie n° 2 : Vente pure & simple - Commercialisation de l'Actif
